H0.text: what did jack london do for a living. Journalist

H2.text: what did jack london do for a living. Prospector

H3.text: what did jack london do for a living. Author

A4.text: John Griffith London (né Chaney; January 12, 1876 – November 22, 1916), better known as Jack London, was an American novelist, journalist and activist.

A5.text: A pioneer of commercial fiction and American magazines, he was one of the first American authors to become an international celebrity and earn a large fortune from writing.
